backend/main.mo: Defines the backend canister with user profiles, wellness data types, resources, debts, medications, and admin‑gated query methods using access control and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping features to related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten 1–2 sentence summaries for many frontend files including pages, hooks, components, and assets.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication, profile setup, onboarding flow, dashboard routing, and tutorial display logic.
frontend/src/components/DebtManagement.t: UI component for managing debts including add/edit/delete, payment logging, progress tracking, and balance charting.
frontend/src/components/MedicationManage: UI component for listing medications and handling add, edit, delete, and adherence logging via query hooks.
Introductory dialog explaining SHAMMAH features with icons and descriptions, shown on initial user onboarding.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, onboarding, photos, medications, debts, and other backend interactions with toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables for theming, dark mode, and scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and mounts the App component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard container with sidebar navigation, page routing, and logout handling.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/JournalPage: Journal interface to view past entries and add new reflections via a dialog.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/Mindfulness: Mindfulness tracker for logging activities and viewing total minutes practiced.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/OverviewPag: Renders a user wellness overview with overall progress, pillar breakdowns, and recent journal/mindfulness activity using fetched user profile data.
Displays detailed content for a specific wellness pillar, including trackers, monitoring toggles, and activity logging tied to reward updates.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/QuizPage.ts: Implements a multi-step wellness quiz, saving responses per question and showing a completion summary when all questions are answered.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/ResourcesPa: Shows categorized wellness resources including videos, ebooks, and guides, using static mock data.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/RewardsPage: Displays user points, badges, and earned rewards, separating achieved and in-progress badges based on user profile data.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing screen with hero section and Internet Identity sign‑in flow.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingFlow.tsx: Guided onboarding capturing a baseline photo and multi‑step wellness quiz.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile creation form allowing users to set email and display name.
frontend/src/utils/buildMarker.ts: Generates a build marker string from environment variables or a timestamp fallback for development.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, and container settings, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current state, known deployment issues, and existing features related to branding, build markers, and cache busting.
